original_text: And I gave you your master's house and your master's wives into your arms and gave you the house of Israel and of Judah. And if this were too little, I would add to you as much more.
korean_text: 네 주인의 집을 네게 주고 네 주인의 아내들을 네 품에 두고 이스라엘과 유다 족속을 네게 맡겼느니라 만일 그것이 부족하였을 것 같으면 내가 네게 이것 저것을 더 주었으리라

sentences.original_text: And I gave you your master's house
and your master's wives into your arms
sentences.korean_translation: 네 주인의 아내들을 네 품에 주었으며

sentences.original_text: and gave you the house of Israel and of Judah.
And if this were too little,
I would add to you as much more.
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 네게 이보다 몇 배나 더 더해주었으리라.
